prompts: Create a cute, small Pokemon with fluffy ears and a long tail, primarily in shades of gray.
Generate a Normal-type Pokemon that looks like a playful rodent with big eyes and fluffy fur.
Imagine a tiny Pokemon that loves to cuddle and has a soft, white body with pink accents.
Design a Pokemon that thrives in urban areas, has a sleek body, and is very agile.
Show me a Pokemon with a friendly demeanor, soft features, and a playful personality that loves to explore.
Make a Pokemon that resembles a small mammal, with a bushy tail and a charming expression.
I want a Pokemon that is both adorable and mischievous, with distinctively large ears and a cute face.
